sections.title: The Classic Cuts Story
sections.content: Classic Cuts was founded in 2015 by lifelong friends Marcus Williams and James Thompson. Frustrated with impersonal chain barbershops, they set out to create a space where every client feels like family. Today, we're proud to be Brooklyn's neighborhood barbershop.
